Unsync Account

This page allows your users to unsync their EE and Facebook accounts.

Warning: You are about to unsync your Facebook account from your EE account. Are you sure you'd like to unsync your accounts?

{exp:fbc:account_sync_form return_when_unsynced="%prefix%main/status/unsynced" }

FYI: This does not completely untie your Facebook account from this EE site. After this, if you want to completely unsync the accounts you'll still need to go to your Apps area in Account Settings on Facebook and remove this site from the list.

{/exp:fbc:account_sync_form}
{embed="%prefix%inc/sidebar"}

About This Page

This page allows your users to unsync their EE and Facebook accounts.

It makes use of the following tags:

  • FBC:Account_Sync_Form to display a form that allows users to unsync their EE account from their Facebook account.

The global sidebar on the right makes use of the following tags:

  • FBC:Login to display a Facebook Login and Logout button, allowing logged in EE users to sync their accounts with Facebook, and allowing logged out users to easily create an account on your site.
  • FBC:Like to display a Facebook "Like" and "Share" button on your site.
  • FBC:Login_Status to display some login information about the currently logged in user. This is also handy for troubleshooting while using FBC.
  • FBC:Activity_Feed to display a list of all recent Facebook activity for this site amongst all users.
